title: Bioacoustics Cookbook
description: examples of common bioacoustic workflows in Python
dataExploration: calculate sunrise and sunset times at coordinate locations, review spectrogram grids
organization: filter audio files to include only specific date ranges, convert between UTM and lat/long coordinates
annotation: review and annotate audio clips based on classifier scores and metadata in Jupyter Notebook
classifierFeatures: train machine learning model, train shallow classifier, generate embeddings
